content: watch house by susan ashcroft size one size fits most adult heads 50 57cm/20-23 yarn requirements worsted weight yarn such as manos del uruguay alegría grande or malabrigo rios allow one 100g/180m skein you can also use any other yarns that will give you gauge such as dk held together with a strand of silk mohair or aran knitted tightly notions 1 stitch marker to mark the end of round optional 3 extra markers to mark the crown repeats manos del uruguay alegría grande on 4mm/us6 needle size 4mm/us6 or any other needle size that gets you can find more yarn ideas and projects linked gauge to the pattern page on ravelry link gauge 18sts per 10cm/4 stretched as for abbreviations and explanations wear k = knit p = purl st s = stitch es p2tog = purl 2 sts together p2tog tbl = purl 2 sts together through the back loops watch house in cullercoats england © susan ashcroft 2025 - for personal non-commercial use only 2 watch house making the hat link for cable cast-on http //stitchnerd blogspot be/2011/10/cable-cast-on html cast-on 96 sts using cable cast-on place a marker and join to work in the round taking care not to twist the stitches tip check after working your first round because if there is a twist at the join you can still untwist at that point rib round 1 on the chart round 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of the round repeat round 1 until the hat is approx 18-20cm/7-8 tall then work the crown tip if you want to measure the height of the hat precisely measure 20 rounds on your knitting that is the additional height that will be added by the crown crown rounds 2 21 on the chart tip placing markers for the repeats can help you to keep track either place one every 24 sts before you start round 2 or after each repeat as you work round 2 work rounds 2-21 once from the written version below or the chart on the next page pull the yarn end through the final 12 sts to secure block lightly if you wish written version of the crown the number of stitches is per repeat round 2 k2 p2tog k2 p2 × 4 k2 p2tog tbl 22 sts round 3 k2 p1 k2 p2 × 4 k2 p1 round 4 k2 p2tog k1 p2 k2 × 3 p2 k1 p2tog tbl 20 sts round 5 k2 p1 k1 p2 k2 × 3 p2 k1 p1 round 6 k2 p2tog p2 k2 × 3 p2 p2tog tbl 18 sts round 7 k2 p3 k2 p2 × 2 k2 p3 round 8 k2 p2tog p1 k2 p2 × 2 k2 p1 p2tog tbl 16 sts round 9 k2 p2 × 4 round 10 k2 p2tog k2 p2 × 2 k2 p2tog tbl 14 sts round 11 k2 p1 k2 p2 × 2 k2 p1 round 12 k2 p2tog k1 p2 k2 p2 k1 p2tog
